document.heading: Foster Care Youth Identity Protection Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-162, the “Foster Care Youth Identity Protection Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-449, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 2, 2010, and March 2, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 2, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-354 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-162 became effective on May 27, 2010.
